page.title: 07The West Swindon Expansion
page.content: During the 60's the Greater London Council, Swindon Corporation and Wiltshire County Council published the {"Silver Plan"}proposing that the area to the west of Swindon be extensivly developed by the building of some {13,000}homes and widespread industrial areas. By 1985 the project resulting from this report has changed the expansion area beyond recognition and angered many local people by the planners apparent disregard for the existing communities . Swindon is currently the{fastest {growing town in the E.E.C.}and thousands of people from around the country have moved to find work at a time of high unemployment. It will be interesting to watch how the expansion fares when the building stops and to see if the "invasion" has been beneficial to West Swindon .
